body:
Dear Radiance Users,


This year's workshop will be hosted by Prof. Rick Mistrick at Penn State University's Naval Yard facility in Philadelphia, PA.


The official dates of the workshop will be Monday August 17th through Wednesday August 19th.


Further details as to tutorial content, websites, etc. will be posted in the near future.


Best,
-Greg
